tool_description: API contains countries state and cities data.
title: Country State

api_list.name: Get Single City
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/cities/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cities By State Id
api_list.description: Return all cities of given state
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/states/{id}/cities"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Single State By Id
api_list.description: Return single state object of given id
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Get States By CountryId
api_list.description: Return all states of given country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries/{countryid}/states"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
